description.value:
When the leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from their body, restoring Hit Points based on the leshy's level to each plant creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. This area is filled with plants, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for these plants, they wither after 24 hours.
